OpenAI.Prompt:
The image provided is a store receipt. Please extract the following information in a structured JSON format:
- 'Store': The name of the store.
- 'Date': The date of the receipt.
- 'Items': An array of objects where each object represents an item with:
  - 'Name': The name of the item.
  - 'Price': The price of the item.
- 'Total': The total amount at the bottom of the receipt.
Focus on accuracy, and if any data cannot be extracted, leave it as null. Return only the JSON object without any additional text or formatting. Please remove any Markdown before returning the object.
